nodes.id: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会
中共靖州苗族侗族自治县委

location.en: Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在湖南省怀化市靖州苗族侗族自治县的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County, Huaihua City, Hunan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共靖州苗族侗族自治县委书记、中共怀化市委常委兼宣传部部长，后因严重违纪违法被查处。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Party Secretary of Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County and a Standing Committee Member and Head of the Propaganda Department of the CPC Huaihua Municipal Committee. He was later investigated for serious violations of discipline and law.

nodes.id: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党湖南省委员会的纪律检查机关。
description.en: The disciplinary inspection agency of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国湖南省的地方国家监察机关。
description.en: The local state supervisory organ of Hunan Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 开除党籍和开除公职的合称，是中国共产党对党员和公职人员的严厉纪律处分。
description.en: An abbreviation for 'expulsion from the Party and removal from public office,' a severe disciplinary action for members of the Communist Party of China and public officials.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共靖州苗族侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Party Secretary of Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共靖州苗族侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Party Secretary of Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共靖州苗族侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Party Secretary of Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共靖州苗族侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure who served as the Party Secretary of Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共靖州苗族侗族自治县委书记。
description.en: A Chinese political figure currently serving as the Party Secretary of Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.en: The state administrative organ of Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County.

relationships.source: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会是中国共产党的地方组织。
description.en: The CPC Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County Committee is a local organization of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县代表大会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县代表大会是中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会的上级机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the CPC Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County Congress is the superior body of the CPC Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County Committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会常务委员会是县委的常设机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Standing Committee of the CPC Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County Committee is the standing body of the county committee.

relationships.source: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 根据信息框，中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县纪律检查委员会是县委的本级纪检机构。
description.en: According to the infobox, the Disciplinary Inspection Commission of the CPC Jingzhou Miao and Dong Autonomous County Committee is the disciplinary inspection agency at the same level as the county committee.

relationships.source: 靖州苗族侗族自治县人民政府
relationships.target: 中国共产党靖州苗族侗族自治县委员会

description.zh-cn: 在中国共产党的领导体制下，地方政府通常接受同级党委的领导。
description.en: Under the leadership system of the Communist Party of China, local governments are generally led by the party committee at the same level.

relationships.source: 中国共产党湖南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 2024年5月10日，张远松因涉嫌“严重违纪违法”，接受湖南省纪委监委纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: On May 10, 2024, Zhang Yuansong was placed under disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Hunan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision for suspected 'serious violations of discipline and law'.

description.zh-cn: 2024年5月10日，张远松因涉嫌“严重违纪违法”，接受湖南省纪委监委纪律审查和监察调查。
description.en: On May 10, 2024, Zhang Yuansong was placed under disciplinary review and supervisory investigation by the Hunan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and Supervision for suspected 'serious violations of discipline and law'.

description.zh-cn: 2024年11月2日，张远松遭到开除党籍开除公职（双开）处分，其政治生涯终结。
description.en: On November 2, 2024, Zhang Yuansong was subject to 'double expulsion' (expelled from the Party and removed from public office), ending his political career.
